p: Add 1-bromoadamantane (10g, 46.5mmols), potassium carbonate (7.7g, 55.8mmols) and palladium on carbon (250mg, catalytic) in benzene and heat to 120°C for 1 week. Cool the reaction to room temperature and filter over Celite® rinsing with EtOAc. Concentrate under reduce pressure to provide the title compound. 1H NMR (400 MHz; CDCl 3) δ 7.2-7.4(m, 5H), 2.10(s, 3H), 1.92(s, 6H), 1.77(s, 6H).
